text_raw:
1. These Regulations may be cited as the European Union (Anti-Money 
Laundering: Central Mechanism for Information on Safe-Deposit Boxes and 
Bank and Payment Accounts) (Amendment) Regulations 2022.

heading: In these Regulations, “Principal Regulations” means the European
text_raw:
2. 

In these Regulations, “Principal Regulations” means the European 
Union (Anti-Money Laundering: Central Mechanism for Information on SafeDeposit Boxes and Bank and Payment Accounts) Regulations 2022 (S.I. No. 
46 of 2022). 

Amendment of Regulation 4 of Principal Regulations

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 3. The Principal Regulations are amended, in Regulation 4, by the
text_raw:
3. The Principal Regulations are amended, in Regulation 4, by the 

insertion of the following paragraph after paragraph (3): 

“(4) In paragraph (1), a reference to an account or a safe-deposit box 
is a reference to an account or a safe-deposit box, as the case 
may be, held by a credit institution on or after 3 February
text_norm: 3 principal regulation amended regulation 4 insertion following paragraph paragraph (3) (4) paragraph (1) reference account safe-deposit box reference account safe-deposit box case may held credit institution 3 february

2022.”.

title: conferred on me by section 3 of the European Communities Act 1972 (No. 27
heading: 4. The Principal Regulations are amended, in Regulation 5, by the
text_raw:
4. The Principal Regulations are amended, in Regulation 5, by the 

substitution of the following paragraph for paragraph (b): 

“(b) in respect of the beneficial owner of the customer-account 

holder— 

(i) 

forename and surname,
